entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 28.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy overnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 28. Wind chill minus 33 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 10:15 PM CST Monday 20 February 2023
